data.title: The Prometheus Deception by Ludlum, Robert
data.meta_description: Condition of Book/DJ: Very Good/Very Good DJ. Page count: 509pp. Type/Size: 8vo = over 9" Publication information: St. Martin's Press, New York, 2000. Edition/Printing: First Edition/First Printing. Illustrator: n/a. ISBN: 0-312-25346-X. Hardcover. Clean interior and exterior. No highlights or markings in text. Bright copy. Strong and tight binding. Spine is bumped at top/bottom edges. DJ is glossy, clean, crisp.
